column4: IBM offers cloud-based services to Chinese firms to address security concerns
column5: BEIJING International Business Machines Corp said on Thursday it would provide cloud-based risk analysis for a Chinese financial data firm in a deal that executives heralded as a model for future business in China  where state-owned enterprises are increasingly shunning foreign technology on security grounds.
